verbs.description: ashes of lgbtq movement symbol matthew shepard [V: laid] [R-ARG0: to rest] [ARGM-TMP: after 20 years without a permanent resting place] the remains of matthew shepard a 21-year - old college student whose brutal murder in 1998 has come to symbolize the plight of the lgbtq community in america were interred at the washington national cathedral on friday gene robinson matt murder matthew shepard u s washington america matthew new york times episcopal cathedral washington national cathedral bishop v gene robinson
